titleStmt.title: The plaintiffs case upon an appeal brought in the House of Lords against
titleStmt.author: Noy, William, Captain.
Fortescue, Peter, Sir, 1620 or 21-1685.

notesStmt.note: To left of title: Capt. William Noy Executor of Honour Noy Plaint, i one bill, Humphrey Sarah Honour Prudence children and administrators of Francis Noy in the other bill are plaintiffs. To right of title: Sir Peter Fortescu Baronet, and Dame Amy his wife, relict, and executrix of Sir Peter Courtny, defendants.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
